title: The Film Emperor Has Brain Damage - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Doctors   Lovers Reunited   Multiple Personalities   Showbiz
author: Xu Banxian   许半仙
description:
“You once loved the 16-year-old me, can you come to love the 30-year-old me again?”

The film emperor was involved in two car accidents at a young age which resulted in brain damage.

The psychiatrist worked on curing him, but the film emperor ended up with a lovestruck brain instead.>
